news.title: xAI lays out interplanetary ambitions in public all-hands
news.summary: On Wednesday, xAI took the rare step of publishing its full 45-minute all-hands presentation to the X platform, making it widely available.

news.title: AI inference startup Modal Labs in talks to raise at $2.5B valuation, sources say
news.summary: General Catalyst is in talks to lead the round for the four-year-old startup, according to our sources.

news.title: OpenAI disbands mission alignment team
news.summary: The team's leader has been given a new role as OpenAI's chief futurist, while the other team members have been reassigned throughout the company.

news.title: Apple’s Siri revamp reportedly delayed… again
news.summary: While the new Siri was expected to launch with the upcoming iOS 26.4 update in March, now, the changes are expected to roll out more slowly over time, reportedly postponing some features until the May iOS update, or even until the release of iOS 27 in September.

news.title: Uber Eats launches AI assistant to help with grocery cart creation
news.summary: Uber Eats launched a new AI feature, “Cart Assistant,” that can automatically add items to your cart based on text or image prompts.

news.title: Highguard’s developer reportedly lays off ‘most’ of its staff just over two weeks after launch
news.summary: Highguard, a new multiplayer shooter from developers who worked on games like Apex Legends and Call of Duty, launched just over two weeks ago, but developer Wildlight Entertainment is already cutting jobs at the company, according to posts from affected staffers on LinkedIn. news.title: iOS 26.3 makes it easier to switch to Android
news.summary: On Wednesday, Apple released its latest iOS 26 update, which includes a new process for switching from an iPhone to an Android phone, as previously reported by 9to5Mac. news.summary: Valentine's Day is often thought of as the quintessential Hallmark holiday - and why wouldn't it be? news.title: Anthropic says it’ll try to keep its data centers from raising electricity costs
news.summary: Anthropic is the latest AI company promising to limit the impact its data centers have on nearby residents' electricity bills. news.title: SpaceX takes down Dragon crew arm, giving Starship a leg up in Florida
news.summary: SpaceX's crew missions will now launch from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station.

news.title: Trump orders the military to make agreements with coal power plants
news.summary: The administration's "reasoning" for doing so has little connection to reality.

news.title: El Paso airport closed after military used new anti-drone laser to zap party balloon
news.summary: "I want to be very, very clear that this should’ve never happened."

news.title: Once-hobbled Lumma Stealer is back with lures that are hard to resist
news.summary: ClickFix bait, combined with advanced Castleloader malware, is installing Lumma "at scale."

news.title: Byte magazine artist Robert Tinney, who illustrated the birth of PCs, dies at 78
news.summary: He became one of the first to visualize personal computing by painting vivid cover art.

news.title: Study of Buddhist Monks Finds Meditation Alters Brain Activity
news.summary: Meditation isn’t thinking about nothing. New research reinforces that it’s a mind-altering, dynamic state that promotes focus, learning, and well-being.

news.title: ‘Heated Rivalry’ Is Bringing New Fans to Hockey. Does the Sport Deserve Them?
news.summary: Obsession over a show about two closeted hockey players has brought new fandom to the sport just ahead of the Olympics. But men's hockey's lack of support for LGBTQ+ players and fans is notable.

news.title: ICE Is Crashing the US Court System in Minnesota
news.summary: Petitions demanding people get the chance to be released from ICE custody have overwhelmed courts throughout the US.

news.title: The ICE Expansion Won’t Happen in the Dark
news.summary: People have a right to know who their neighbors are, especially when it’s ICE.

news.title: I Loved My OpenClaw AI Agent—Until It Turned on Me
news.summary: I used the viral AI helper to order groceries, sort emails, and negotiate deals. Then it decided to scam me.
